newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-BRAUN WINS WORLD HEPTATHLON TITLE.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-BRAUN WINS WORLD HEPTATHLON TITLE.

text.p: German Sabine Braun won the world heptathlon gold medal on the third day of the world championships on Monday.
Denise Lewis of Britain took the silver and Lithuanian Remigia Nazaroviene the bronze.
